attributes.action: The PM to tell the House of Commons how she'll fix our NHS.  Every MP to attend.
attributes.background: The National Health Service belongs to us.   We do not have to accept the current winter crisis.  We do not have to accept underfunding.  We do not have to accept excuses from our Government. Most of all, we do not have to accept our brilliant NHS staff being worked into the ground.   Enough.
